text:
*\[1/20\]* How old are you\?\

*A*\. I have 24 years old\.\
*B*\. I have 24 years\.\
*C*\. I am fine\.\
*D*\. I am 24 years old\.

*\[2/20\]* Justin Bieber went to work\.\.\. \

*A*\. with car\.\
*B*\. by car\.\
*C*\. on car\.\
*D*\. in car\.

*\[3/20\]* Hailey is \.\.\.\.\. Justin to get up now\.\

*A*\. telling\
*B*\. sayings\
*C*\. saying to\
*D*\. telling to

*\[4/20\]* We haven't got \.\.\.\.\. money\.\

*A*\. a lot\
*B*\. some\
*C*\. any\
*D*\. many

*\[5/20\]*  Choose the right sentence\:\

*A*\. He like going to the movies\.\
*B*\. He likes going to the movies\.\
*C*\. He liked go to the movies\.\
*D*\. He like the movies\.

*\[6/20\]*   \.\.\.\. some more coffee\?\

*A*\. Do you\?\
*B*\. Do you like\?\
*C*\. You'd like\
*D*\. Would you like\?

*\[7/20\]* He plays tennis \.\.\.\.\.\

*A*\. on Wednesdays\.\
*B*\. in Wednesdays\.\
*C*\. at Wednesdays\.\
*D*\. by Wednesdays\.

*\[8/20\]* He \.\.\.\.\. never been to the USA\.\

*A*\. does\
*B*\. has\
*C*\. haven't\
*D*\. hadn't

*\[9/20\]* When she arrived, he\.\.\.\.\.\

*A*\. already left\.\
*B*\. has already left\.\
*C*\. had already left\.\
*D*\. left\.

*\[10/20\]*  By the time you finish the work I \.\.\.\.\.\

*A*\. will have left\.\
*B*\. leave\.\
*C*\. going to leave\.\
*D*\. would left\.

*\[11/20\]* The room can't be dirty she\.\.\.\.\.\

*A*\. is just clean it\.\
*B*\. have just cleaned it\.\
*C*\. just clean it\.\
*D*\. has just cleaned it\.

*\[12/20\]* Have you sent that letter to Mr\. Taylor\? Yes\, I've \.\.\.\.\. done that\.\

*A*\. still\
*B*\. yet\
*C*\. already\
*D*\. now

*\[13/20\]* This is the girl \.\.\.\.\. I met on Thursday\.\

*A*\. whom\
*B*\. which\
*C*\. what\
*D*\. \-\-\-\-\-

*\[14/20\]* You can watch TV \.\.\.\.\. you like\.\

*A*\. whenever\
*B*\. soon\
*C*\. always\
*D*\. whatever

*\[15/20\]*  She \.\.\.\.\. go to school yesterday\.\

*A*\. must\
*B*\. had to\
*C*\. ought to\
*D*\. should have

*\[16/20\]*  Carl’s very \.\.\.\.\.\.\. He’s never late\, and he never forgets to do things\.\

*A*\. reliable\
*B*\. patient\
*C*\. strict\
*D*\. thrilled

*\[17/20\]* The government plans to \.\.\.\.\.\. taxes on sales of luxury items\.\

*A*\. increase\
*B*\. expand\
*C*\. go up\
*D*\. skip

*\[18/20\]* Mandy works for a computer software company\. She got \.\.\.\.\.\. recently\, and so now she’s an area manager\.\

*A*\. made redundant \
*B*\. sacked\
*C*\. a raise \
*D*\. promoted

*\[19/20\]*  Photographers and designers need to be very \.\.\.\.\.\.\.\

*A*\. creative\
*B*\. fit\
*C*\. annoying\
*D*\. focused

*\[20/20\]*  I’ve been working here \.\.\.\.\.\.\. about the last two years\.\

*A*\. during\
*B*\. for\
*C*\. since\
*D*\. in
